about_the_game:
CONTRAST - Original Soundtrack + Art Book includes digital copies of Shadow Music – A Soundtrack to Contrast and the Official Art Book.

  • Shadow Music – A Soundtrack to Contrast: Enjoy the digital version (MP3) of the 16-track album, featuring the sultry performance of Jazz singer Laura Ellis. Every track is featured in the game and highlights Contrast’s unique world, atmosphere, and style.
  • Contrast Official Art Book: See the cast and crew behind the scenes of the shadowy platformer. Detailing the conception and production the game, the Official Art Book includes the official art, unused concept images, and even the story behind the music and sound.
